DOC.brief_summary: A 24-hour urine pilot study conduct part 2013 NHANES test feasibility implement 24-hour urine collection part NHANES 2014 .
DOC.brief_title: National Health Nutrition Examination Survey 24-hour Urine Collection Feasibility Study , 2013
DOC.detailed_description: The 24-hour urine pilot study conduct March - June 2013 three NHANES location . A random half-sample non-pregnant US adult , age 20-69 examined NHANES mobile examination center select . Participants receive instruction , start end urine collection urine study mobile examination center ( UMEC ) , answered question collection . A random half participant collect complete 24-h urine ask collect second 24-h urine . Urinary sodium , potassium , chloride , creatinine excretion analyze . Participation rate two post-examination component , Physical Activity Monitor Dietary Recall , monitor determine whether collect 24-hour urine effect response rate two component .
DOC.criteria: 2069 year old adult examine NHANES mobile examination center pregnant , unable respond
